SEARCH
Package org.apache.sshd.sftp.client

Interface SimpleSftpClient

All Superinterfaces:
AutoCloseable, Channel, Closeable
All Known Implementing Classes:
SimpleSftpClientImpl
public interface SimpleSftpClient extends Channel
A simplified synchronous API for obtaining SFTP sessions.
Author:
Apache MINA SSHD Project

  • Method Details

    • sftpLogin

      default SftpClient sftpLogin(String server, String username, String password) throws IOException
      Creates an SFTP session on the default port and logs in using the provided credentials
      Parameters:
      server - The target server name or address
      username - Username
      password - Password
      Returns:
      Created SftpClient - Note: closing the client also closes its underlying session
      Throws:
      IOException - If failed to login or authenticate

    • sftpLogin
